name: The Fool
meaning: Embarking on new beginnings

name: The Magician
meaning: Manifesting your own dreams and desires

name: The High Priestess
meaning: Look within and trust your own intuition

name: The Empress
meaning: Relax and allow yourself to be open to all forms of love

name: The Emperor
meaning: You're in control, so don't be afraid to take action

name: The Hierophant
meaning: Continue learning while also upholding your own values

name: The Lovers
meaning: You're in alignment with yourself, healthy relationships can blossom.

name: The Chariot
meaning: You're on the right path, be intentional and prepare to take action

name: Strength
meaning: Be confident and trust yourself when it comes to overcoming obstacles

name: The Hermit
meaning: Take some time to connect with your inner self

name: Wheel of Fortune
meaning: Embrace life's cycles of ups and downs to invite what's meant for you

name: Justice
meaning: Truth will be revealed in due time. Remain true to yourself.

name: The Hanged Man
meaning: Take a breath, reflect, and change your perspective on your situation.

name: Death
meaning: Embrace that a major transformation is afloat. Release what no longer serves you.

name: Temperance
meaning: Trust in divine timing.

name: The Devil
meaning: Confront the unhealthy behaviors that are present as the first step to healing.

name: The Tower
meaning: Sudden breakdowns and upheavals are occuring to bring in new opportunities.

name: The Star
meaning: Hope and healing from your situation are coming soon. Don't lose faith.

name: The Moon
meaning: Things once hidden are going to be revealed. Trust your intuition.

name: The Sun
meaning: You'll receive clarity on your situation, continue to be optimistic.

name: Judgement
meaning: Accepting what has happened in the past is necessary in order to move forward.

name: The World
meaning: A cycle is ending allowing for you to reap the rewards and begin a new journey.
